text: Bryan is a train station located on the north side of downtown Bryan, Ohio, at Paige and Lynn Streets. Served by Amtrak, the United States' national railway system, Bryan is an unmanned station eight miles south of the Ohio Turnpike. The station is located across the tracks from a former Lake Shore and Michigan Southern Railway station and east of a former New York Central freight house. ==References== == External links == *Bryan Amtrak Station (USA Rail Guide -- Train Web) *Bryan, OH (BYN) (Amtrak's Great American Stations) Category:Amtrak stations in Ohio Category:Transportation in Williams County, Ohio Category:Buildings and structures in Williams County, Ohio
title: Bryan station (Ohio)
